name: Covid Coin
description: Covid Coin is a verified and audited secure tokenomics token with reflection and automatic burn fee on every transaction. Realistic transfer fee which is only 10% of the total transfer amount. 5% of the fee will be redistribute equally to all token HODLer. Remaining 3% of the fee will be burn forever to increase price floor hence preventing inflation. Dev only get 2% from remaining fee for future development. A total supply of Covid Coin is only 1 quadrillion token.
